panels.content:
graph TD
collaboration-tool --> message-bus((message-bus))
dynamic-case[dynamic-case] --> message-bus
collaboration-transformer-app[collaboration-transformer-app] --> message-bus
collaboration-transformer-app[collaboration-transformer-app] --> redis((redis))
task-command-consumer-app[task-command-consumer-app] --> message-bus
notification-command-consumer-app[notification-command-consumer-app] --> message-bus
task-indexer-app[task-indexer-app] --> message-bus 
notification-indexer-app[notification-indexer-app] --> message-bus 
message-bus --> zookeer((zookeeper))
task-indexer-app --> elasticsearch((elasticsearch))
elasticsearch --> task-service-app 
notification-indexer-app --> elasticsearch
elasticsearch --> notification-service-app

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "health" WHERE ("application" = 'collaboration-transformer-app') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "value" FROM "health" WHERE ("application" = 'notification-command-consumer-app') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "value" FROM "health" WHERE ("application" = 'task-command-consumer-app') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "value" FROM "health" WHERE ("application" = 'notification-indexer-app') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "value" FROM "health" WHERE ("application" = 'task-indexer-app') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "value" FROM "health" WHERE ("application" = 'task-service-app') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "value" FROM "health" WHERE ("application" = 'notification-service-app') AND $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "uptime_in_millis" FROM "elasticsearch_jvm" WHERE $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "uptime" FROM "redis" WHERE $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "version" FROM "zookeeper" WHERE $timeFilter AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance

panels.title: Topology view

targets.query: SELECT "mem_used_percent" FROM "elasticsearch_os" WHERE $timeFilter  AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
SELECT "cpu_percent" FROM "elasticsearch_os" WHERE $timeFilter  AND time > now() - $metricUnavailabilityTolerance
